subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Danny Pate came in third in Thursday’s stage of the Giro d’Italia, behind Michele Scarponi of Italy and Félix Rafael Cárdenas of Columbia.
snippet: Danny Pate came in third in Thursday’s stage of the Giro d’Italia, behind Michele Scarponi of Italy and Félix Rafael Cárdenas of Columbia.
